body.p: In determining the disclosures for leases, the IASB considered the following:

li.p: the disclosure requirements for financial liabilities in IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures;
the disclosure requirements for non-current assets such as property, plant and equipment;
work on other related projects such as the Disclosure Initiative (a broad-based initiative to explore how disclosures in IFRS financial reporting can be improved); and
feedback received on the disclosure proposals in the 2010 and 2013 Exposure Drafts.
